leon.skillDescription: Summons Holy Sword that deals physical damage equal to (80/180/340)% of hero's attack power based on chain length.

form.name: Leon
form.background: Leon has just started his adventure and he has no idea what he's doing. He spends more time cleaning up his messes than saving damsels.

form.name: Skilled Leon
form.background: Leon has learned from his mistakes (and his scrapes and bruises) and has become a competent if not spectacular hero.

form.name: Famous Leon
form.background: Leon's famous now and he lets it get to his head. He draws his pen faster to sign autographs than he draws his sword for combat.

form.name: Leon of Destiny
form.background: Leon's big shot attitude almost cost him his life and the lives of those he had sworn to protect. He realizes now that he set out to become a hero to save people, not to be rewarded with fame and fortune.

skill.passive: Summons the ultimate Holy Sword every 4 blocks. Deals physical damage equal to 380% of attack power and ignores target's armor equal to 50% of own armor.

form.name: Leon of Fate
form.background: Leon has been charged by the goddesses to save the world. Finally, he can put all that adventuring to good use!

skill.passive: Summons the ultimate Holy Sword every 4 blocks. Deals physical damage equal to 380% of attack power and ignores target's armor equal to 50% of own armor.

form.name: Leon of Light
form.background: Every time Leon fights against evil, dazzling lights cover his entire body, radiating an unbreachable energy. The monsters tremble at his sight, let them fall to Leon of Light

skill.passive: Summons Ultimate Holy Sword whenever the hero uses a chain-3 skill, that deals physical damage equal to 380% of the hero's attack power and also deals extra physical damage equal to 10% of the hero's HP. The bonus damage ignores enemy's armor equal to 100% of the hero's armor.

rochefort.skillDescription: When a skill block is used it deals physical damage equal to (100/150/250)% according to the chain length, and provides a (25/50/75)% chance of blocking up to 10 attacks for the next 5 secs.

form.name: Rochefort
form.background: Rochefort was a simple fencing instructor until he was drafted into the Tristan army.

form.name: Libertine Rochefort
form.background: Rochefort became so sick of his life that he illegally escaped from the army seeking freedom and beautiful women.

form.name: Romantic Rochefort
form.background: As Rochefort entered the war with the Neth Empire, he encountered D'artagnan and fell in love. He lost an eye while trying to protect her in a fierce battle.

form.name: One-Eyed Rochefort
form.background: Rochefort announced his desire to join the Musketeers. His request is denied, but he continued to train.

skill.passive: If an attack is blocked, the Hero immediately counterattacks dealing physical damage equal to 100% of the Hero's defense. When a skill block is used after the counterattack, the Hero counterattacks 3 additional times. (Activates once every second)

form.name: Musketeer Rochefort
form.background: Rochefort's exploits could no longer be ignored, and he was allowed admission into the Musketeers.

skill.passive: If an attack is blocked, the Hero immediately counterattacks dealing physical damage equal to 100% of the Hero's defense. When a skill block is used after the counterattack, the Hero counterattacks 3 additional times. (Activates once every second)

form.name: Victor Rochefort
form.background: His name became a symbol of victory in Trista, and his legend grew among the people. However, his heart belonged to a single person.

skill.passive: If an attack is blocked, the Hero immediately counterattacks dealing physical damage equal to 200% of the Hero's defense. When a skill block is used after the counterattack, the Hero counterattacks 3 additional times. When the counterattack is a critical hit, the Hero immediately generates a block of its own. (Activates once every second)

kriemhild.skillDescription: Explodes with the energy of the earth, dealing physical damage equal to (50/142/322)% of attack power based on the chain number.

form.name: Kriemhild
form.background: A female knight of a tribe known for fighting demons. The most skillful knights of this tribe are Kriemhild and Siegried. People think there's a lot of chemistry going on between those two.

form.name: Cursed Kriemhild
form.background: A demon slaying knight who was cursed by a powerful demon to sleep forever.

form.name: Kriemhild of Misfortune
form.background: To save Kriemhild from the cruse, her lover, Siegfried, uses a forbidden tribal spell to undertake Kriemhild's curse for himself. When Kriemhild awakens and learns what happened, she is overwhelmed with grief and is unable to leave her lover's side.

form.name: Kriemhild of Massacre
form.background: Not long after Kriemhild lost her lover, demons come looking for Siegfried's soul. Kriemhild's sorrow turns to rage, slaughtering all the demons that approach Siegfried.

skill.passive: When a chain-3 skill is used, auto attacks for the next 2 seconds deal physical damage equal to 380% of the hero's attack power and activate the ultimate Flamespout that stuns enemies for 0.75 seconds (max 2 times). This effect cannot be canceled and is not enhanced by buffs.

form.name: Kriemhild of Protection
form.background: The only way for Siegfried can wake is for him to find an exit in his dream world. It is an endless wait for Kriemhild, but she has faith in him. She makes a resolution not to leave his side until he wakes up.

skill.passive: When a chain-3 skill is used, auto attacks for the next 2 seconds deal physical damage equal to 380% of the hero's attack power and activate the ultimate Flamespout that stuns enemies for 0.75 seconds (max 2 times). This effect cannot be canceled and is not enhanced by buffs.

form.name: Kriemhild of Oath
form.background: A Goddess appears before her as she is protecting Siegfried. The Goddess offers her help to awaken him, and in return asks Kriemhild to help them save the world from danger when the time comes. For her lover, she makes an oath to do so.

skill.passive: When a chain-3 skill is used, auto attacks for the next 5 seconds deal physical damage equal to 380% of the hero's attack power and activate the ultimate Flamespout that stuns enemies for 0.75 seconds (max 4 times). This effect cannot be canceled and is not enhanced by buffs.

roland.skillDescription: When a skill block is used, the Hero deals physical damage equal to (50/100/175)% of the hero's resistance according to the chain length and the Hero's defense increases by 25% of hero's resistance for 5 secs.

form.name: Roland
form.background: An orphan who became an apprentice monk in service to the Goddesses.

form.name: Strong Roland
form.background: Roland was very strong, showing brilliant talents in physical activities rather than practicing asceticism. At first he was a troublemaker but he gained the trust of the people after he successfully took on the village thugs.

form.name: Monk Roland
form.background: Roland begins to agonize about his future. During his slump, he met Maria. After that, Roland starts his training to become a true monk so that he can be with Maria.

form.name: Shining Roland
form.background: Roland's efforts did not go unnoticed, and he is offered a position with the Paladins of the Goddesses.

skill.passive: After the hero's skill block is used, the hero heals the entire party for 40% of the hero's attack power every time the hero is attacked by an enemy for the next 5 secs.

form.name: Roland of Justice
form.background: Roland dedicated his life as a paladin to defending Maria.

skill.passive: After the hero's skill block is used, the hero heals the entire party for 40% of the hero's attack power every time the hero is attacked by an enemy for the next 5 secs.

form.name: Roland of Honor
form.background: Roland guarded Maria with all his might, and his skill and prowess were legendary throughout the world.

skill.passive: After a skill block is used, the hero heals the entire party for 60% of the hero's attack power every time the hero is attacked by an enemy for the next 5 secs (5 times max). After the 8th healing, the hero stuns all enemies for 2 secs and generates a block of his own (once every 3 secs).

sigruna.skillDescription: Shoots feathers that attack the enemies in back, dealing magic damage equal to (10/25/52)% of the hero's attack power based on chain length.

form.name: Sigruna
form.background: Sigruna is a member of the Silver Elf clan. She lives a very tough life because she is from the lowest caste in the elves' caste-based society.

form.name: Sigruna of Endeavor
form.background: One day, her parents were attacked by monsters. In order to support her family, she tries to climb the social ladder at all costs. There is only one way to do this: join the King's Elite Guard. To make it, Sigruna trains whenever possible.

form.name: Sigruna of Spirit
form.background: After failing her 7th examination, she gives up on her hopes and dreams. Her parents, who have recovered from the attack, encouraged her to go on. Now Sigruna feels unstoppable.

form.name: Expert Archer Sigruna
form.background: Sigruna's efforts finally pay off. With her excellent archery skills, she joins the Elite Guard and is now an expert archer.

skill.passive: Using chain-3 skill activates 4 magic arrows that deal magic damage equal to 70% of the hero's attack power.

form.name: God Archer Sigruna
form.background: Sigruna continues to train, even after joining the Elite Guard. Her humble beginnings lead her to conserve everything, always making sure not to waste a single arrow. Elven tradition dictates that trees are sacred, so Sigruna's act of not wasting arrows made from trees has made her a role model for others. She is now known as the "Archer God".

skill.passive: Using chain-3 skill activates 4 magic arrows that deal magic damage equal to 70% of the hero's attack power.

form.name: Demon Archer Sigruna
form.background: One day, demons had attacked the clan, and Sigruna shoots down countless numbers of them. She draws her bow as if she was born to hunt down the demons. Afterward, a Goddess appears asking her to use that power to save the world.

skill.passive: Using chain-3 skill activates 4 magic arrows that deal magic damage equal to 100% of the hero's attack power. These arrows have an additional 25% chance to crit.

demona.skillDescription: Shoots thorns of hell to an enemy in the rear and deals magic damage equal to (50/120/250)% of the Hero's attack power. A flame stack will pile up equal to (1/2/3).

form.name: Demona
form.background: Centuries ago, the Apostles brought demons from another dimension to destroy Hasla, and those demons wrecked havoc using humans as hosts. Demona was one of these human hosts.

form.name: Demona the Fiend
form.background: Demona battled against the evil inside of her, until one day, a saintess exorcised the demon from her, leaving only the power behind. This was the birth of the first devil.

form.name: Demona of the Pit
form.background: Humans associated the demons with evil. Demona fought a lonely fight against humanity. However, more and more demons were born, and Demona gathered them together.

form.name: Demona of Revenge
form.background: After the war with the Apostles, the Goddesses started to hunt the Demons for their crimes. Demona summoned the Demons together and began a war against the Goddesses.

skill.passive: An enemy damaged by Thorns of Hell is lit on fire and receives neutral damage equal to 50% of the Hero's Attack Power. When this effect is stacked 4 times, the hero shoots a flame arrow that deals magic damage equal to 350% of the Hero's Attack Power. (Activates once every 3 seconds)

form.name: Demona of Dawn
form.background: Demona grew weary of the constant persecution of the demons, and decided to lead them to a new land. This marked the beginning of a new dawn for the demons.

skill.passive: An enemy damaged by Thorns of Hell is lit on fire and receives neutral damage equal to 50% of the Hero's Attack Power. When this effect is stacked 4 times, the hero shoots a flame arrow that deals magic damage equal to 350% of the Hero's Attack Power. (Activates once every 3 seconds)

form.name: Demona of the Red Lotus
form.background: The demons that remained in Hasla were hunted down as the Order of the Goddesses grew, and Demona knew she had to return. She entered the Primal mountain and awakened the power of the Red Lotus.

skill.passive: An enemy damaged by Thorns of Hell is lit on fire and receives neutral damage equal to 50% of the Hero's Attack Power. When this effect is stacked 4 times, the hero shoots the ultimate flame arrow that deals 150% neutral damage and 350% magic damage. (Activates once every 3 seconds)

d'artagnan.skillDescription: Fires consecutive bullets, dealing physical damage equal to (81/297/540)% of attack power based on the chain number.

form.name: D'Artagnan
form.background: A new gunman in the desert area. Despite not used to using a gun she still dreams of becoming a sheriff one day.

form.name: Hunter D'Artagnan
form.background: A women who has fully mastered the gun through endless training. She's well known for arresting countless outlaws.

form.name: Musketeer D'Artagnan
form.background: Highly skilled at capturing outlaws and a master of weaponry. D'Artagnan fights in the war between the Neth Empire and the Western Country. Her prowess on the battlefield earns her the attention of the Musketeers. She joins the Musketeers and although they are few in number, they are a powerful force in the Western Country.

form.name: D'Artagnan of Loyalty
form.background: During the war, the forces of the Neth Empire marched callously past even their own injured soldiers, but D'Artagnan remained to protect her own. Thus she became a symbol of compassion and justice.

skill.passive: Whenever this Hero is healed or uses a skill block, it has a 50% chance to immediately use a chain-3 Consecutive Fire. (Activates once every 3 seconds.)

form.name: D'Artagnan of Faith
form.background: Having survived many battles without losing faith, she has become a symbol of faith to the people. her popularity is widespread throughout the land.

skill.passive: Whenever this Hero is healed or uses a skill block, it has a 50% chance to immediately use a chain-3 Consecutive Fire. (Activates once every 3 seconds.)

form.name: D'Artagnan of Iron Will
form.background: She never gives up and her tenacity is legendary. She is the envy of every man in the Western Country.

skill.passive: Whenever this Hero is healed or uses a skill block, it has a 75% chance to immediately use a chain-3 Consecutive Fire. (Activates once every 3 seconds.)

teresa.skillDescription: Shoots a magic beam dealing magical damage equal to (75/150/275)% of the Hero's attack power according to the chain length and leaves the Mark of Light on the eenmy of 5 secs.

form.name: Teresa
form.background: Born in a slum in Trista. She made her living by stealing and begging, but she was quick-witted and dexterous. People say that her father used to be a legendary hunter.

form.name: Poor Teresa
form.background: Teresa got caught stealing from a Western outlaw. She tried to escape by grabbing the outlaw's weapon but accidently shot him.

form.name: Runaway Teresa
form.background: With blood on her hands, Teresa ran away. Teresa struggled to survive with all her might.

form.name: Redeemed Teresa
form.background: Teresa met Melissa, who was on a mission in the wilderness. After listening to Teresa's story, Melissa took Teresa to the Order of the Goddesses.

skill.passive: Enemies with the Mark of Light loses 3 SP everytime it tries to attack. If the enemy's SP is below 30, the hero immediately deals magic damage equal to 200% of the Hero's attack power. (Activates once every 3 seconds)

form.name: Calvary Teresa
form.background: Teresa joined the calvary at Melissa's recommendation. With outstanding skills and strong obedience, Teresa soon became a true soldier. One day, she heard a rumor that Melissa was murdered by a demon.

skill.passive: Enemies with the Mark of Light loses 3 SP everytime it tries to attack. If the enemy's SP is below 30, the hero immediately deals magic damage equal to 200% of the Hero's attack power. (Activates once every 3 seconds)

form.name: Night Witch Teresa
form.background: Teresa was ordered to abandon her search for Melissa's killer, but she refused and left the Order to join the 'Night Witches.'

skill.passive: Enemies with the Mark of Light loses 3 SP everytime it tries to attack. If the enemy's SP is below 30, the hero immediately deals magic damage equal to 350% of the Hero's attack power. (Activates once every 3 seconds)

dorothy.skillDescription: Fires Magic Beam, dealing magic damage equal to (70/150/240)% of the hero's attack power based on chain length.

form.name: Dorothy
form.background: Born with a high affinity to magic, her latent talent is great.

form.name: Genius Dorothy
form.background: In addition to her affinity for magic, Dorothy also grasps magical concepts very easily. She is a true genius.

form.name: Genius Witch Dorothy
form.background: Dorothy has become skilled in all 4 elements of magic. However, her craving for power is not sated.

form.name: Purple Light Witch Dorothy
form.background: Dorothy's passion for magic continues. She finally makes a resolution to become an apprentice of the 4 great witches and master the forbidden dark magic.

skill.passive: When a chain-3 skill is activated within 1.5 seconds after a chain-1 skill is activated, an extra beam is fired that deals magic damage equal to 310% of the hero's attack power.

form.name: Red Witch Dorothy
form.background: Dorothy becomes an apprentice of the four great witches. She travels north, east, south, and west, training very hard.

skill.passive: When a chain-3 skill is activated within 1.5 seconds after a chain-1 skill is activated, an extra beam is fired that deals magic damage equal to 310% of the hero's attack power.

form.name: Black Witch Dorothy
form.background: Dorothy learns the spells of the four great witches, as well as the forbidden dark magic. Because dark magic is forbidden, Dorothy is expelled by the witches and is called the Black Witch. But she still intends on gaining more magical knowledge, so the Goddess gives her a mission to rightly use her power.

skill.passive: When a chain-3 skill is activated within 1.5 seconds after a chain-1 skill is activated, an extra beam is fired that deals magic damage equal to 310% of the hero's attack power. The extra beam eliminates all buffs from the enemy.

cano.skillDescription: Deals magic damage equal to (85/125/250)% according to the chain length and charms the enemy for 5 seconds.

form.name: Cano
form.background: She was not only smart and polite but she sung very well so everyone liked her. The only problem was that she looked very ordinary...

form.name: Top Student Cano
form.background: Cano studied hard to enter the School of Magic. She concentrated on her study to the point of isolation. Still, the people of the village sent her letters to keep her company.

form.name: Beautiful Cano
form.background: Cano received the highest score on the school's entrance examination. She attended the school talent show and won by singing. However, she accidently tripped on her way off the stage and her glasses broke... Surprise! She was the most beautiful girl in school!

form.name: Transformed Cano
form.background: Cano became famous as a beautiful genius wizard. One day, a producer from popstar entertainment offered her a chance to be a popstar. Cano became a popstar spreading hope and happiness to people.

skill.passive: Every time an ally uses a skill block 4 times, the Hero shoots a Love Beam at the charmed enemies dealing magical damage equal to 200% of the hero's attack power.

form.name: Popstar Cano
form.background: Cano became a famous popstar. She studied hard and learned a new spell which can convert the love and hope of her fans into her own power.

skill.passive: Every time an ally uses a skill block 4 times, the Hero shoots a Love Beam at the charmed enemies dealing magical damage equal to 200% of the hero's attack power.

form.name: Magical Girl Cano
form.background: Cano became the mascot of 'The Night Witches'. She received a mission to slay Demona. Reminded of her vocation, she started her new journey.

skill.passive: Every time an ally uses a skill block 4 times, the Hero shoots a Love Beam at the charmed enemies dealing magical damage equal to 200% of the hero's attack power. Charmed enemies hit by Love Beam have a 40% chance of missing their next attack.

maria.skillDescription: Summons an object that heals nearby allies 8 times for (1/3/6)% of the Hero's attack power based on the chain number.

form.name: Maria
form.background: An ordinary girl that lives in a small church in town. Due to her kind and devoted attitude, she receives the respect of the people in town despite being very young.

form.name: Sister Maria
form.background: Living in a church, the girl eventually becomes a sister and her popularity and virtue spread beyond the town.

form.name: Mother Superior Maria
form.background: As her internal strength continues to show divine power, the religious order of the Empire begins to pay great attention to her. Although she is young she is qualified to become Mother Superior.

form.name: Saintess Maria
form.background: There are only three saintesses in the world. Unlike ordinary people, a saintess has unequalled holy power and is considered to be a guardian that protects people from evil. But now, the world has its fourth saintess.

skill.passive: Allies healed by Sacred Treasure of the Goddess become immune to debuffs for 0.5 seconds. When a block is used after an ally's chain-3 skill, the ally will immediately lose all debuffs.

form.name: Saintess of Salvation Maria
form.background: Devils began to appear all over the world. The people of the empire were in utter chaos, looking for the light that would bring them salvation. Maria, after hearing their prayers, was more than willing to use her power.

skill.passive: Allies healed by Sacred Treasure of the Goddess become immune to debuffs for 0.5 seconds. When a block is used after an ally's chain-3 skill, the ally will immediately lose all debuffs.

form.name: Savior Saintess Maria
form.background: The humans are devastated by the endless battles against the demons. However, Maria never surrenders to the demons and never loses faith in the power of light she possesses. This faith reaches the Goddess, and Maria is blessed by the Goddess' divine grace

skill.passive: Allies healed by Sacred Treasure of the Goddess become immune to debuffs for 0.5 seconds. When a block is used after an ally's chain-3 skill, the block will act identically to the previous chain-3 skill and the ally will immediately lose all debuffs. (Activates once every 2 seconds)

melissa.skillDescription: Heals (1/1/all) ally/allies equal for (100/230/250)% of the Hero's attack power based on the chain length, and curses the enemy wth the lowest HP for 5 seconds.

form.name: Melissa
form.background: A sister of the Order of the Goddesses. After rescuing a mysterious black spirit, she now sees a black aura. Her parents were worried about her so they sent her to the abbey.

form.name: Crusader Melissa
form.background: With sober judgment and daring determination, Melissa was closer to a soldier than a sister. She became a segeant. Melissa was obsessed with hiding her secret from her abbey.

form.name: Melissa of the Wilderness
form.background: Melissa found a girl in danger in the wilderness and she rescued the girl with the power of the black spirit. Melissa brought the girl to her abbey and wondered about her hidden power.

form.name: Melissa of Truth
form.background: Melissa met Demona, the very first Demon. Demona told Melissa everything about her power, the demons and the Order of the Goddesses. Melissa's heart was shaken to the very core.

skill.passive: Cursed enemy receives 50% of all heals that may be given to them. When a healed ally attacks the cursed enemy, it deals 300% magic damage.

form.name: Wandering Melissa
form.background: Melissa investigated the secrets of the Order of the Goddesses on her own and discovered the truth about the Order. She left the abbey to find her own path.

skill.passive: Cursed enemy receives 50% of all heals that may be given to them. When a healed ally attacks the cursed enemy, it deals 300% magic damage.

form.name: Black Sister Melissa
form.background: Melissa established the Black Order with Demona. Melissa became the Black Sister and sought to put an end to the Order of the Goddesses and their hidden agenda.

skill.passive: Cursed enemies cannot be healed. When a healed ally attacks the cursed enemy, it deals 300% magic damage, and the party will be healed for 10% of the damage.

joan.skillDescription: Throws a wave of energy that deals magic damage equal to (49/122/221)% of attack power based on the chain number.

form.name: Joan of Arc
form.background: A girl who wants to become a knight to avenge her parent's death. However, she knows it is difficult for a girl become a knight, but she hopes she can become strong enough to overcome their prejudice.

skill.passive: Increases leader's SP by 15 whenever a block is used.

howToGet: Noble Honor Box: Acquired chance to get Noble honor box!

form.name: Knight Joan of Arc
form.background: Joan of Arc becomes a knight after rigorous training, but she must hide the fact that she is a girl. Luckily, the armor for men isn't as revealing as the armor for women.

skill.passive: Increases leader's SP by 15 whenever a block is used.

howToGet: Noble Honor Box: Acquired chance to get Noble honor box!

form.name: Steel Knight Joan of Arc
form.background: Even after she revealed that she was indeed female, her stoic demeanor and calm in battle earned her the title of Steel Knight.

skill.passive: Increases leader's SP by 30 and takes allies' damage for 5 seconds whenever a block is used.

vivian.skillDescription: Summons a demon sword that deals magic damage equal to (56/178/322)% of attack power based on chain number.

form.name: Vivian
form.background: The direct descendant of the royal devil family, 'Devilius.' Her father kicked her out of the house for spending too much time on the couch. She may be the only person that will look wistful when told to "go to heck."

skill.passive: Upon chain-3 combo, summons Call of Demon Sword and deals magic damage equal to 380% of attack power. Afterwards, reduces damage received by 50% for 3 secs.

howToGet: Contract!: Only Contracts! (Except Noble Honor Box)

form.name: Devil Vivian
form.background: Vivian has trained herself using the rage she feels towards her father to spur her on. She hatches a plan to invade the underworld and overthrow her father, but upon arriving at his house, all she finds is a note that says "Gone Fishing."

skill.passive: Upon chain-3 combo, summons Call of Demon Sword and deals magic damage equal to 380% of attack power. Afterwards, reduces damage received by 50% for 3 secs.

howToGet: Contract!: Only Contracts! (Except Noble Honor Box)

form.name: Absolute Devil Vivian
form.background: Vivian start a war to clear her head. Surprisingly, the other devils surrender instantly. Lo and behold, Vivian is now the Absolute Devil.

skill.passive: Upon chain-3 combo, summons Call of Demon Sword and deals magic damage equal to 380% of attack power. Afterwards, reduces damage received by 50% for 3 secs. Upon enemy attack ultimate demon sword is summoned again. (Up to 2 times.)

howToGet: Contract!: Only Contracts! (Except Noble Honor Box)

thor.skillDescription: Explodes with inner power, dealing magic damage equal to (50/142/322)% of attack power based on the chain number.

form.name: Thor
form.background: Head of the Northern Kingdom, bravely fighting against the cold. Working day and night since he was young, he helped the people of the north survive the winters, but Thor's hair could not.

skill.passive: Using a block after an ally uses a chain-3 skills increases the Hero's armor and resistace by 200% for 5 seconds. During this time, the Hero is granted a 35% chance to counter-atack with a thunder strike that deals magical damage equal to 30% of the Hero's HP. Activates once every 2 seconds).

howToGet: Noble Honor Box: Acquired chance to get Noble honor box!

form.name: Thor of the North
form.background: Since there was not a single hair left on Thor, the citizens presented him with a huge helmet that could cover his bald head.

skill.passive: Using a block after an ally uses a chain-3 skills increases the Hero's armor and resistace by 200% for 5 seconds. During this time, the Hero is granted a 35% chance to counter-atack with a thunder strike that deals magical damage equal to 30% of the Hero's HP. Activates once every 2 seconds).

howToGet: Noble Honor Box: Acquired chance to get Noble honor box!

form.name: Thor of Severe Cold
form.background: Even through the severe cold, Thor does his best to protect the kingdom. As the kingdom gets better, so does Thor's hair.

skill.passive: Using a block after an ally uses a chain-3 skills increases the Hero's armor and resistace by 200% for 5 seconds. During this time, the Hero is granted a 50% chance to counter-atack with a thunder strike that deals magical damage equal to 45% of the Hero's HP. Activates once every second).

alexander.skillDescription: Knock back enemies, dealing physical damage equal to (58/178/271)% of attack power based on the chain number.

form.name: Alexander
form.background: Alexander vowed to cross the continent to see the legendary sea that lies beyond.

skill.passive: When a block is used, the hero's armor and magic resistance increases by 3% of maximum hp for 5 seconds.

howToGet: Noble Honor Box: Acquired chance to get Noble honor box!

form.name: King Alexander the Great
form.background: Alexander moves up and becomes a Great King. But even in his position as the Great King, he still desires to see the sea across the continent and prepares an expedition to do so.

skill.passive: When a block is used, the hero's armor and magic resistance increases by 3% of maximum hp for 5 seconds

howToGet: Noble Honor Box: Acquired chance to get Noble honor box!

form.name: Emperor Alexander
form.background: Alexander finally reaches the eastern end of the continent. To his disappointment, the sea he fins is not the legendary sea he sought. However, by the time he reaches the sea, he is an Emperor.

skill.passive: When a block is used, the hero's armor and magic resistance increases by 3% of maximum hp for 5 seconds, and receives allies damage

achilles.skillDescription: Summons spears that deal physical damage equal to (15/35/50)% of attack power, and prevents enemy approach based on the chain number.

form.name: Achilles
form.background: A representative in the Roman Republic, soaked his son Achilles in mysterious water to make him immortal. However, the water turned out to be just an ordinary stream.

skill.passive: Decreases attacked enemy's attack power and resistance by 30% of the hero's attack power. Block skills used, after an ally's chain-3 skill is activated, will have the power of a chain-3 skill. (Once every 2 seconds)

howToGet: Noble Honor Box: Acquired chance to get Noble honor box!

form.name: Hero Achilles
form.background: Achilles, who believes himself to be immortal, remains victorious after charging an enemy camp. The people bestow him with the title of hero after the victory, but his heel still aches.

skill.passive: Decreases attacked enemy's attack power and resistance by 30% of the hero's attack power. Block skills used, after an ally's chain-3 skill is activated, will have the power of a chain-3 skill. (Once every 2 seconds)

howToGet: Noble Honor Box: Acquired chance to get Noble honor box!

form.name: War God Achilles
form.background: One day, Achilles figures out that he had never been immortal and becomes bery depressed. In order to cheer him up, the Roman Republic representatives present him a golden armor. At the moment he wore the armor, he became suddenly overwhelmed by a mysterious energy which granted him a great power.

form.background: A bounty hunter from another dimension. Born half human half gear. Sin grows much faster than humans because of his gear blood. In reality he is only 10 years old. For Sin's safety, Kai, Sin's father, has left Sin to Sol, the bounty hunter. Unfortunately, Sin knows nothing about his father and has always had a grudge against Kai.

skill.passive: When hero uses 3 blocks, immediately activates "It's time to grow". Afetr the activation block skill will change to RTL once. RTL deals magic damage equal to (120/260/500)% of the hero's attack power.

form.name: Sin Kiske
form.background: Sin has resolved all misunderstandings he has had with his father, after participating in wars with him. Meanwhile, "Senate" has cooked up a scheme to revive Justice the destroyer, but is blocked. However, due to "Ruthless Revelation", they lose Elphelt.

skill.passive: When hero uses 3 blocks, immediately activates "It's time to grow". Afetr the activation block skill will change to RTL once. RTL deals magic damage equal to (120/260/500)% of the hero's attack power.

form.name: Sin Kiske
form.background: Unexpected helper came to Sin's party. He was 'Raven', the close associate of 'That Man'. Sin and his party checked out that Raven has the same objective but a different reason to 'That Man', and accept Raven as a party for the journey. During the journey, an unexpected change in dimension occured, and Sin was ditched at Hasla.

skill.passive: When hero uses 3 blocks, immediately activates "It's time to grow". Afetr the activation block skill will change to RTL twice. RTL deals magic damage equal to (120/260/500)% of the hero's attack power.

billykane.skillDescription: Thrusts pole to deal physical damage equal to [90/180/270]% of attack power.

form.name: Billy Kane
form.background: A poor youth working in a factory belonging to Howard Connection. Billy works day and night to protect his younger sister Lily Cane, who is suffering from a heart disease.

skill.passive: Upon using block after ally's 3-chain, uses "Chou Kaen Senpuu Kon" that deals additional physical damage equal to 140% of HP. Enemies are pushed back while spinning flames. Power MAX Effect: Upon activation, armor is increased by 350 for 8 seconds.

form.name: Billy Kane
form.background: One day Billy gets into a fight with the factory workers, defeating them all with his skills at the three sectional staff. He is noticed by Geese Howard, the CEO of Howard Connection, and becomes his personal bodyguard and later second-in-command.

skill.passive: Upon using block after ally's 3-chain, uses "Chou Kaen Senpuu Kon" that deals additional physical damage equal to 140% of HP. Enemies are pushed back while spinning flames. Power MAX Effect: Upon activation, armor is increased by 350 for 8 seconds.

form.name: Billy Kane
form.background: Under Geese's orders to find out more about Orochi's powers, Billy enters "The King of Fighters." He tries to team up with Iori Yagami, only to be attacked and defeated by the ill-tempered Iori. At that moment, a brilliant explosion transports Billy to Hasla.

skill.passive: Upon using block after ally's 3-chain, uses "Chou Kaen Senpuu Kon" that deals additional physical damage equal to 235% of HP. Enemies are pushed back while spinning flames. Deals additional neutral damage equal to 30% of attack power per hit. Power MAX Effect: Upon activation, armor is increased by 350 for 8 seconds.

hong-ran.skillDescription: Shoots a portable firecracker which deals magical damage equal to (80/150/350)% of hero's attack power to the enemy with least amount of HP left according to chain number.

form.name: Hong-Ran
form.background: Hong-Ran could never forget about the beautiful fireworks she watched at a festival when she was young. She decides to become a great fireworks craftsman. She always quotes, "I will become the greatest Queen of fireworks!"

skill.passive: When chain-3 skill is used, hit enemy becomes stunned for 0.5 seconds and their accuracy and chance of evasion decreases by 20% for 5 seconds.

form.name: Hong-Ran of Fireworks
form.background: Hong-Ran becomes the disciple of a famous fireworks craftsman. While she was training, she met Jin-Kyung and had a deep conversation about each other's future. Being inspired by Jin-Kyung's vision and diligence, she decided to work even harder to achieve her dreams.

skill.passive: When chain-3 skill is used, hit enemy becomes stunned for 0.5 seconds and their accuracy and chance of evasion decreases by 20% for 5 seconds.

form.name: Hong-Ran of Flame
form.background: Hong-Ran becomes the best fireworks craftsman in the empire. One day the emperor himself asked Hong-Ran to prepare for the national festival for Jin-Kyung. Excited to hear that, Hong-Ran works her hardest for Jin-Kyung to present the best festival. However, she was accidentally sucked up by the dimentional portal which opened up mysteriously.

skill.passive: When chain-3 skill is used, hit enemy becomes stunned for 0.5 seconds and their accuracy and chance of evasion decreases by 20% for 5 seconds. When ally uses chain-3 skill, hero fires installable firecracker which deals magical damage equal to 300% of attack power instead of auto attacking for 5 seconds.

altair.skillDescription: Hero shines a beam of moonlight towards the enemy at the rear. Targeted enemies are hit by shooting stars which deal magical damage equal to (7/20/45)% of Hero's attack power based on the length of the block chain.

form.name: Altair
form.background: Altair is the only son of an aristocrat. He is very kind-hearted and handsome and although he is not as strong as most men, he was taught the ways of archery by Giparang. When Chen invaded Han, he volunteered for the battle to fulfill his obligation as an aristocrat.

skill.passive: Mark of the moon appears on the ally at the front for 5 seconds when chain-3 skill is activated. Marked ally deals magical damage equal to 50% of targeted enemy's attack power to surrounding enemies per second.

form.name: Moonlight Artair
form.background: Altair shoots Rebecca's horse out from under her and she is thrown to the ground. However, Altair is surrounded by the Chen army and although he escapes, he is wounded in the process. Rebecca comes to his aid and he is able to get away.

skill.passive: Mark of the moon appears on the ally at the front for 5 seconds when chain-3 skill is activated. Marked ally deals magical damage equal to 5% of targeted enemy's attack power to surrounding enemies per second.

form.name: MoonShadow Artair
form.background: After the war, Altair's father sends him to recuperate in a small village. While living in the village alone, Altair remembers Rebecca and the aid she gave him. He realizes his love for her and leaves the village to find her.

skill.passive: When a chain-3 skill is activated, a Lunar Mark appears on all allies, that increases their armor and resistance by 75%. The Lunar Mark also deals magical damage to surrounding enemies equal to 75% of the enemies' attack power every .5 seconds.

chippzanuff.skillDescription: Uses a Y blade that deals magical damage equal to (120/200/450)% of hero's atack power based on the chain length.

form.name: Chipp Zanuff
form.background: He almost got murdered by the Assassin's Guild, but a healing master saved his life and Chipp became his disciple. However, there was an attack from the Assasin's Guild and the master sacrificed himself to save Chipp. Since then Chipp's life is all about revenge.

skill.passive: When Y blade hits enemy, the hero gets 1 block by 50% chance at the cost of 30 SP.

form.name: Chipp Zanuff
form.background: During his trip he met various people, and realized that having more power is necessary to get rid of the infelicities. In order to be the most powerful person, he decided to become the chief of the nation, the president.

skill.passive: When Y blade hits enemy, the hero gets 1 block by 50% chance at the cost of 30 SP.

form.name: Chipp Zanuff
form.background: Chipp became a president of East Chipp Kingdom, the unauthorized state. To be recognized as an authorized state he seeks Ramlethal, who is fighting against the world. Finally he finds Ramlethal, but due to the unexpected change in dimension, he and his fellows arrived at Hasla.

skill.passive: When Y blade hits enemy, the hero gets 1 block by 75% chance at the cost of 20 SP. Using a block after ally use chain-3 will activate throwing knives that deal magical damage equal to (80/100/120)% of attack power each and create 1 block.

bearguy.skillDescription: Showers the area with soda, dealing (50/142/322)% physical damage based on the hero's attack power.

form.name: Bear Guy
form.background: This bear-man has the uncanny ability to control soda, which is a lot more useful than it sounds.

skill.passive: The attack speed and crit. chance of enemies hit by soda will be reduced by 50% for 5 seconds. When an ally uses a chain-3 skill, another chain-3 Soda Eruption will activate. (Once every 2 seconds)

fergus.skillDescription: Deals physical damage equal to (85/180/295)% of attack power according to the chain number.

form.name: Fergus
form.background: The only Blacksmith in the village. When he sees a strong weapon he just can't refrain from upgrading it. Every time outsiders visit the village looking for the 'legendary weapon hunter', Fergus close the shop and hide somewhere.

skill.passive: When the hero uses a block skill, Great Success Attack deals 350% of hero's attack power will be activated by 30% chance. Great Success Attack will be counted as chain-3 attack.

greenelf.skillDescription: Shoots a candy bar that deals (34/122/221)% physical damage based on the hero's attack power. It tastes like it's made of cinnamon and fire!

form.name: Green Elf
form.background: A mischievous elf. He shoots candy bars at children every Christmas, but always misses.

skill.passive: Enemies on fire have a 50% chance of being stunned for 1 second. When other heroes use a chain-3 skill, 2 candy bars will be summoned that deal physical damage equal to 221% of the Hero's attack power. (once every 2 sec)
